panels.description: Total trips run on the current date

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT id)
FROM
  trips
WHERE
  start_time >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
  AND end_time <= CAST($__timeTo() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
  AND fleet_name = '$fleetvar'
  AND status = 'succeeded';

SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN SPLIT_PART(sherpa_name, '-', 3) IS NOT NULL THEN SPLIT_PART(sherpa_name, '-', 1) || '-' || SPLIT_PART(sherpa_name, '-', 2)
    ELSE sherpa_name
  END AS sherpa_name,
  ROUND(
    SUM(
      (
        SELECT
          SUM(s)
        FROM
          UNNEST(route_lengths) s
      )
    )
  ) / 1000 AS Distance
FROM
  trips
WHERE
  fleet_name = '$fleetvar'
  AND status = 'succeeded'
  AND sherpa_name IS NOT NULL
  AND start_time >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
  AND end_time <= CAST($__timeTo() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
GROUP BY
  sherpa_name;

SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN SPLIT_PART(sherpa_name, '-', 3) IS NOT NULL THEN
      SPLIT_PART(sherpa_name, '-', 1) || '-' || SPLIT_PART(sherpa_name, '-', 2)
    ELSE
      sherpa_name
  END AS sherpa_name,
  COUNT(*) AS trip_count
FROM
  trips
WHERE
  start_time >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
  AND end_time <= CAST($__timeTo() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
  AND end_time IS NOT NULL
  AND fleet_name = '$fleetvar'
  AND status = 'succeeded'
GROUP BY
  sherpa_name;

panels.description: Total distance run on the current date

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  SUM(subquery.distance) / 1000 AS Distance,
  subquery.start_date AS Date
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      start_time :: DATE AS start_date,
      (
        SELECT
          SUM(s)
        FROM
          UNNEST(route_lengths) s
      ) AS distance
    FROM
      trips
    WHERE
      start_time >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
      AND end_time <= CAST($__timeTo() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
      AND fleet_name = '$fleetvar'
      AND status = 'succeeded'
  ) AS subquery
GROUP BY
  subquery.start_date;

panels.description:
Robot in fleetmode with ongoing trips / total hours in fleetmode
This statistic depends on how the client uses the bot.

targets.rawSql:
WITH Numerator AS (
  SELECT
    sherpa_name,
    SUM(
      EXTRACT(
        EPOCH
        FROM
          (end_time - start_time)
      )
    ) as trip_time
  FROM
    trips
  WHERE
    start_time >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
    AND end_time <= CAST($__timeTo() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
    AND fleet_name = '$fleetvar'
    AND status = 'succeeded'
    AND sherpa_name is NOT NULL
  GROUP BY
    sherpa_name
),
Denominator AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(
      EXTRACT(
        EPOCH
        FROM
          (MAX_end_time - MIN_start_time)
      )
    ) AS total_denominator
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        MAX(end_time) AS MAX_end_time,
        MIN(start_time) AS MIN_start_time
      FROM
        trips
      WHERE
        start_time >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
        AND end_time <= CAST($__timeTo() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
        AND fleet_name = '$fleetvar'
        AND status = 'succeeded'
        AND sherpa_name is NOT NULL
      group by
        end_time :: date
    ) AS subquery
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN SPLIT_PART(n.sherpa_name, '-', 3) IS NOT NULL THEN SPLIT_PART(n.sherpa_name, '-', 1) || '-' || SPLIT_PART(n.sherpa_name, '-', 2)
    ELSE n.sherpa_name
  END AS Sherpa,
  ROUND(n.trip_time / d.total_denominator * 100) AS Utilization
FROM
  Numerator n
  CROSS JOIN Denominator d
WHERE
  n.trip_time > 0;

panels.title: Utilization

targets.rawSql:
WITH joined_table AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN SPLIT_PART(t.sherpa_name, '-', 3) IS NOT NULL THEN SPLIT_PART(t.sherpa_name, '-', 1) || '-' || SPLIT_PART(t.sherpa_name, '-', 2)
      ELSE t.sherpa_name
    END AS Sherpa,
    t.route as Route,
    t.start_time as start_time,
    t.end_time as end_time,
    a.actual_trip_time as Trip_Time,
    a.time_elapsed_obstacle_stoppages as Obstacle_Time,
    a.time_elapsed_visa_stoppages as Visa_Time,
    a.time_elapsed_other_stoppages as Other_Time,
    t.fleet_name,
    t.status as status
  FROM
    trips AS t
    INNER JOIN trip_analytics AS a ON t.id = a.trip_id
  WHERE
    t.fleet_name = '$fleetvar'
    AND t.status = 'succeeded'
    AND t.start_time >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
    AND t.end_time <= CAST($__timeTo() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
)
SELECT
  Sherpa,
  Route,
  AVG(
    EXTRACT(
      EPOCH
      FROM
        (end_time - start_time)
    )
  ) AS Trip_time
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      Sherpa,
      Route,
      start_time,
      end_time,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
        PARTITION BY Sherpa
        ORDER BY
          COUNT(*) DESC
      ) AS route_rank,
      fleet_name,
      status
    FROM
      joined_table
    GROUP BY
      Sherpa,
      Route,
      start_time,
      end_time,
      fleet_name,
      status
  ) ranked_data
WHERE
  route_rank = 1
  AND fleet_name = '$fleetvar'
  AND status = 'succeeded'
  AND start_time >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
  AND end_time <= CAST($__timeTo() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
GROUP BY
  Sherpa,
  Route;

panels.description: Average Obstacle Time for each tug on its most used route

targets.rawSql:
WITH joined_table AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN SPLIT_PART(t.sherpa_name, '-', 3) IS NOT NULL THEN SPLIT_PART(t.sherpa_name, '-', 1) || '-' || SPLIT_PART(t.sherpa_name, '-', 2)
      ELSE t.sherpa_name
    END AS Sherpa,
    t.route as Route,
    t.start_time as start_time,
    t.end_time as end_time,
    t.fleet_name,
    t.status as status,
    a.actual_trip_time as Trip_Time,
    a.time_elapsed_obstacle_stoppages as Obstacle_Time,
    a.time_elapsed_visa_stoppages as Visa_Time,
    a.time_elapsed_other_stoppages as Other_Time
  FROM
    trips AS t
    INNER JOIN trip_analytics AS a ON t.id = a.trip_id
  WHERE
    t.fleet_name = '$fleetvar'
    AND t.status = 'succeeded'
    AND t.start_time >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
    AND t.end_time <= CAST($__timeTo() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
)
SELECT
  Sherpa,
  Route,
  AVG(Obstacle_Time) AS Total_Obstacle_Time
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      Sherpa,
      Route,
      start_time,
      end_time,
      Obstacle_Time,
      fleet_name,
      status,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
        PARTITION BY Sherpa
        ORDER BY
          route_count DESC
      ) AS route_rank
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          Sherpa,
          Route,
          start_time,
          end_time,
          Obstacle_Time,
          fleet_name,
          status,
          COUNT(*) AS route_count
        FROM
          joined_table
        GROUP BY
          Sherpa,
          Route,
          start_time,
          end_time,
          Obstacle_Time,
          fleet_name,
          status
      ) counted_data
  ) ranked_data
WHERE
  route_rank = 1
  AND fleet_name = '$fleetvar'
  AND status = 'succeeded'
  AND start_time >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
  AND end_time <= CAST($__timeTo() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
GROUP BY
  Sherpa,
  Route;

panels.title: Average Obstacle Time

panels.description: Average Time for each tug waits for dispatch button press at its most used route

targets.rawSql:
WITH joined_table AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN SPLIT_PART(t.sherpa_name, '-', 3) IS NOT NULL THEN SPLIT_PART(t.sherpa_name, '-', 1) || '-' || SPLIT_PART(t.sherpa_name, '-', 2)
      ELSE t.sherpa_name
    END AS Sherpa,
    t.route as Route,
    t.start_time as start_time,
    t.end_time as end_time,
    t.trip_metadata as trip_metadata,
    t.fleet_name,
    t.status
  FROM
    trips AS t
    INNER JOIN trip_analytics AS a ON t.id = a.trip_id
  WHERE
    t.fleet_name = '$fleetvar'
    AND t.status = 'succeeded'
    AND t.start_time >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
    AND t.end_time <= CAST($__timeTo() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
)
SELECT
  Sherpa,
  Route,
  COALESCE(
    CAST(
      trip_metadata ->> 'total_dispatch_wait_time' as numeric
    ),
    0
  ) AS total_dispatch_time
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      Sherpa,
      Route,
      start_time,
      end_time,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
        PARTITION BY Sherpa
        ORDER BY
          COUNT(*) DESC
      ) AS route_rank,
      fleet_name,
      status,
      trip_metadata
    FROM
      joined_table
    GROUP BY
      Sherpa,
      Route,
      start_time,
      end_time,
      fleet_name,
      status,
      trip_metadata
  ) ranked_data
WHERE
  route_rank = 1
  and fleet_name = '$fleetvar'
  AND status = 'succeeded'
  AND start_time >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
  AND end_time <= CAST($__timeTo() AS timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE '$tz'
GROUP BY
  Sherpa,
  Route,
  trip_metadata;

panels.title: Average Dispatch wait time
